Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.admin

Class AdminPageController

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.controllers.admin.AdminPageController
public class AdminPageController extends Object
Controller class for the admin page This class is responsible for handling the user interactions and updating the UI for the admin page.
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)

    • deleteSelectedFilms

      private void deleteSelectedFilms()
      Deletes the selected films from the database. If a film is currently rented, it cannot be deleted. If a film is deleted, it is removed from the list view.
